name: Richard Littauer
bio: Full stack developer, nomad, poet, sailor, linguist, writer, and runner. Always making new projects, always iterating on the old ones.

name: Vernon Lillies
bio: Full stack developer with a love for flying robots, Cleantech, and weekly food specials. Always learning new skills and giving 100% to get the job done.

name: Joanna Katsifaraki
bio: Love designing, coding and developing responsive websites, drinking lattes, green tea, listening to lounge, jazz, running and playing tennis.

name: Hanie Jafari
bio: Full-stack developer, UX/UI follower, Marketing, Strategy, startups. Loves innovative solutions. Always excited to learn more. Enjoys Yoga, swimming, cooking and hanging out with friends.
